subject: Re: Pseudo----Sine wave
author: Tim
full_text:
hi frank, this is interesting, i wonder how it sounds in a modded stereo.

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
>  Can't really tell by the meter, looks almost the same as the triangle
> sweep. except it seems to slow slightly at the peaks. I also change the
> timing cap to 100uf, and use a 100K linear pot for frequency, in series with
> a 10k resistor instead of the 560 ohm.  The 10k resisitor is to try to
> prevent the motorboating sound when the sweep is too fast. Instead of
> providing the trianlge out, I used the last op amp for level setting, adding
> the DC offset, which goes to the + input, instead of the usual inverting
> input.
> 
>  F-S
>
